CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Such improvement of PCE comes from relatively highefficiency photon - to - electron conversion in the broad range of the absorption in the blend film of PDTP - DTDPP(Bu) and PCBM.

Let's think step by step.

The "Material Name" entities in the paragraph are:

1. PCE
2. PDTP
3. DTDPP(Bu)
4. PCBM
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

Sure, here are the entities that clearly refer to Material Name in the paragraph:

1. PDTP
2. DTDPP(Bu)
3. PCBM

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Sure, here are the valid entities in a Markdown table with one column "Material Name":

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PDTP |
| DTDPP(Bu) |
| PCBM |

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Such improvement of PCE comes from relatively highefficiency photon - to - electron conversion in the broad range of the absorption in the blend film of PDTP - DTDPP(Bu) and PCBM.

Let's think step by step.

The "Property Name" entities in the paragraph are:

1. PCE (Photovoltaic Conversion Efficiency)
2. PDTP (Poly[2,6-(4,8-dimethyl-3,8-diphenyl-2,1,3-benzothiadiazole)-alt-3,6-diphenyl-2,1,3-benzoxadiazole])
3. DTDPP(Bu) (4,8-dimethyl-3,8-diphenyl-2,1,3-benzothiadiazole-5,5'-diyl-diphenyl-phosphine oxide)
4. PCBM (Poly[3,3'-bis(4-fluorophenyl)-2,2'-bithiophene])
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Property.

Sure, here are the entities that clearly refer to Material Property in the given paragraph:

1. PCE (Photovoltaic Conversion Efficiency)
2. PDTP (Poly[2,6-(4,8-dimethyl-3,8-diphenyl-2,1,3-benzothiadiazole)-alt-3,6-diphenyl-2,1,3-benzoxadiazole])
3. PCBM (Poly[3,3'-bis(4-fluorophenyl)-2,2'-bithiophene])

The entity "DTDPP(Bu)" does not clearly refer to a material property, as it is a specific compound that is mentioned as a component of the blend film, but it does not describe a property of the material.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Sure, here are the valid entities in a Markdown table with one column "Property Name":

| Property Name |
| --- |
| PCE |
| PDTP |
| PCBM |

Note that I've kept the entities as they were in the original paragraph, without any modification or abbreviation.

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Such improvement of PCE comes from relatively highefficiency photon - to - electron conversion in the broad range of the absorption in the blend film of PDTP - DTDPP(Bu) and PCBM.

Let's think step by step.

The "Property Value" entities in the paragraph are:

1. "high efficiency" (describing the photon-to-electron conversion)
2. "broad range" (describing the absorption in the blend film)
3. "PDTP-DTDPP(Bu)" and "PCBM" (describing the materials used in the blend film)
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

Sure, here are the entities that clearly refer to the value of a material property:

1. "high efficiency" (describing the photon-to-electron conversion)
2. "broad range" (describing the absorption in the blend film)

The entities "PDTP-DTDPP(Bu)" and "PCBM" are not directly related to the value of a material property, so they can be removed from the list.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Sure, here's a Markdown table with the valid entities presented in the same words as in the original paragraph:

| Property Value |
| --- |
| high efficiency |
| broad range |
